apis.description: Removes a label from all labeled objects and deletes it

operations.summary: Removes a label from all labeled objects and deletes it
operations.notes: Delete label identified by name. All broadcasts and numbers currently containing the label will have the label association removed.
Return list of all defined label names. The labels may be associated with broadcasts or numbers.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: Max number of results to return limited to 1000 (default: 1000)

apis.description: Adds a label to a broadcast, creating the label if it doesn't already exist

operations.summary: Adds a label to a broadcast, creating the label if it doesn't already exist
operations.notes: Label broadcast (Voice, Text, or IVR) by specifying broadcastId and label name. If label name doesn't currently exist on system it will be created and saved.

apis.description: Removes a label from a single broadcast

operations.summary: Removes a label from a single broadcast
operations.notes: Remove label from broadcast. This doesn't remove label from system, it just removes association between broadcast and label.

apis.description: Adds a label to a single number

operations.summary: Adds a label to a single number
operations.notes: Label number by specifying E.164 11 digit number identifier and label name. If label name doesn't currently exist on system it will be created and saved.

parameters.name: Number
parameters.description: List of E.164 11 digit numbers space seperated and optional fieldName

apis.description: Removes a label from a single number

operations.summary: Removes a label from a single number
operations.notes: Remove label from number. This doesn't remove label from system, it just removes association between number and label.

parameters.name: Number
parameters.description: List of E.164 11 digit numbers space seperated and optional fieldName
